[code][CHARACTER] character-heightLev0 character-posx = 3441 character-posy = 3552 character-height 0 character-rights = 4 character-donator =0 character-marks =0 character-kill = 0 character-lastconnection = cm219.epsilon20.maxonline.com.sg character-lastlogin = 20060101 character-energy = 78[/code]
how do i make it donator to people....
my ::yell show me this [code] if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if (muted == 0 && !command.contains("battlescape") && !command.contains("scape") && !command.contains("no-ip") && !command.contains("ayuda") && !command.contains(":chalreq:") && !command.contains(":duelreq:") && !command.contains(":tradereq:")) { String titles = "";
if (playerRights == 0) { titles = ""; } if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "[Server Info]"; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "[Moderator] "; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "[Admin] "; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "[Staff] "; } if (donator == 1) { titles = "[Donator] "; } if (donator == 2) { titles = "[Super Donator] "; } PlayerHandler.messageToAll = titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5); } else { sendMessage("That is blocked from the yell command."); } }[/code]
i change this [code]character-donator =0[/code] become this [code]character-donator =2[/code]
when i compile and run server...i type ::yell
it not saying [donator] skiller:hi

item.description:

ok…i try[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2008, 10:09:28 PM[/size][hr]it dosent work…when i put this

character-donator = 2

then i log in…i type::yell hi
it say this
skiller hi

and how mine is = 2
the space…

So character-donator =[spacehere]2

how do i make it donator to people…

my ::yell show me this

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (muted == 0 && !command.contains(“battlescape”)
&& !command.contains(“scape”) && !command.contains(“no-ip”)
&& !command.contains(“ayuda”)
&& !command.contains(":chalreq:")
&& !command.contains(":duelreq:")
&& !command.contains(":tradereq:")) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Server Info]";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Staff] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
            if (donator == 2) {
                titles = "[Super Donator] ";
            }
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5);
        } else {
            sendMessage("That is blocked from the yell command.");
        }
    }[/code]

i change this

become this

character-donator =2

when i compile and run server…i type ::yell

it not saying [donator] skiller:hi
